hero.title: Create Innovation and Design Experiences with Code
hero.desc: Hi, I'm Taeho, a Full-stack Developer based in South Korea.

gridItem1.title: I am good at collaborating and communicating with colleagues.

gridItem2.title: I'm very flexible with time zone communications

gridItem4.title: Tech enthusiast with a passion for development.

gridItem5.title: Currently building a Hybrid App with flutter

gridItem6.title: Do you want to start a project together?

work1.title: OLAP Firm as A Backend Engineer

approach1.title: Finding & Selection
approach1.desc: Before I start learning new programming languages, I choose a field that interests me and use Google Trends to find the most popular languages ​​or frameworks in that field.

approach2.title: Development & Doing
approach2.desc: I create a personal project using the selected language. For the backend, I add CRUD, and for the frontend, I add various latest libraries to create a personal homepage.

approach3.title: Goal
approach3.desc: Once you become somewhat familiar with the language or framework, you can immediately implement something small that you ultimately wanted to do.
